TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit CollectionBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public MustInherit Class CollectionBase Implements IList
public ref class CollectionBase abstract : System::Collections::IList
type CollectionBase = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Provides the base class for a strongly typed collection.

span.span: Provides the base class for a strongly typed collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A一定是可修改執行個體。A instance is always modifiable. 請參閱這個類別的唯讀版本。See for a read-only version of this class. 容量是項目數目可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 當項目加入至，就會自動增加容量視需要透過重新配置。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 藉由設定，您可以減少容量屬性明確。The capacity can be decreased by setting the property explicitly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立的集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 (在 Visual Basic 中) 這種類型的成員都具備執行緒安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此實作不會提供同步處理 （安全執行緒） 包裝函式，但在衍生的類別可以建立自己的同步的版本使用屬性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並不是執行緒安全的程序。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

span.para: 這個基底類別可讓實作器建立自訂的強類型的集合更容易。實作者都來擴充這個而不是建立自己的基底類別。
This base class is provided to make it easier for implementers to create a strongly typed custom collection. Implementers are encouraged to extend this base class instead of creating their own.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default initial capacity.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default initial capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是項目數目，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目加入至，就會自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部的陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以評估集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數個調整大小作業時新增元素至。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 這個建構函式是 o （1） 運算。This constructor is an O(1) operation.

.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 capacity) cil managed
Protected Sub New (capacity As Integer)
protected: CollectionBase(int capacity);

param.name: capacity
param.span: The number of elements that the new list can initially store.

span.span: The number of elements that the new list can initially store.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified capacity.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是項目數目，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目加入至，就會自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部的陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以評估集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數個調整大小作業時新增元素至。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 這個建構函式為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是`capacity`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Capacity { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Capacity
Public Property Capacity As Integer
public: property int Capacity { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Capacity : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the number of elements that the can contain.

span.span: Gets or sets the number of elements that the can contain.
The number of elements that the can contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的項目數，可以儲存。 is the number of elements that the can store. 是實際的項目數目。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 永遠是大於或等於。 is always greater than or equal to . 如果超過時加入項目，容量會自動增加之前複製的舊項目並加入新項目後，重新配置內部的陣列。If exceeds while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 藉由設定，您可以減少容量屬性明確。The capacity can be decreased by setting the property explicitly. 當值會設定明確地在內部陣列也重新配置到符合指定的容量。When the value of is set explicitly, the internal array is also reallocated to accommodate the specified capacity. 擷取這個屬性的值是 o （1） 運算。將屬性設定為 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是新的容量。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the new capacity.

summary.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the instance.

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the instance.
An for the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `for each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上，呼叫擲回例外狀況。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最後一個呼叫傳回`false`，則呼叫擲回例外狀況。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，列舉程式會永久失效，而且下次呼叫或會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果之間修改集合和，傳回項目所設定，即使列舉值已經無效。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 列舉值對集合並沒有獨佔存取，因此列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 雖然方法看不到 COM 用戶端，根據預設，繼承類別將它公開和 COM 用戶端會造成非預期的行為。While the method is not visible to COM clients by default, inheriting the class can expose it and can cause undesirable behavior in COM clients. 這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立的集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

summary.span: Performs additional custom processes when clearing the contents of the instance.

span.span: Performs additional custom processes when clearing the contents of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的預設實作是由衍生類別先執行某些動作，才能清除集合覆寫。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action before the collection is cleared. 只有在所傳回的執行個體上叫用 On \* 方法屬性，但不是能在所傳回的執行個體屬性。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果此程序失敗，集合會還原回先前的狀態。If the process fails, the collection reverts back to its previous state. 這個方法的預設實作是 o （1） 運算。The default implementation of this method is an O(1) operation.

span.para: 這個方法可讓實作器定義必須刪除所有項目從基礎之前執行的處理序。藉由定義這個方法，實作者可以將功能加入繼承的方法而不需要覆寫所有其他方法。 之前叫用標準的清除行為，而清除的標準行為之後叫用。比方說，實作者可以排除特定項目從全域清除被刪除。

This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed before deleting all the elements from the underlying . By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods. is invoked before the standard Clear behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard Clear behavior. For example, implementers can exempt certain elements from deletion by a global Clear.

span.para: 這個方法可讓實作者定義的基礎時，插入項目之前必須先執行處理序。藉由定義這個方法，實作者可以將功能加入繼承的方法而不需要覆寫所有其他方法。 之前叫用標準的插入行為，而標準插入行為之後叫用。比方說，實作者可以限制哪些類型的物件可以插入到。 在這個方法之前呼叫。

This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed before inserting the element into the underlying . By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods. is invoked before the standard Insert behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard Insert behavior. For example, implementers can restrict which types of objects can be inserted into the . is called prior to this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的預設實作是由衍生類別以執行某些動作，然後才移除指定的項目覆寫。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action before the specified element is removed. 只有在所傳回的執行個體上叫用 On \* 方法屬性，但不是能在所傳回的執行個體屬性。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果此程序失敗，集合會還原回先前的狀態。If the process fails, the collection reverts back to its previous state. 這個方法的預設實作是 o （1） 運算。The default implementation of this method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立的集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed before removing the element from the underlying . By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods. is invoked before the standard Remove behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard Remove behavior. For example, implementers can prevent removal of elements by always throwing an exception in . is called prior to this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在相鄰元素的集合中，例如清單，接在移除的元素之後的元素會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A未同步處理執行個體。A instance is not synchronized. 在衍生的類別可以提供的同步化的版本使用屬性。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the using the property. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並不是執行緒安全的程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別可以提供自己的同步處理的版本使用屬性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業的、 直接依據。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體而言，保持正常的同步處理與其他可能同時修改的執行緒物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並不是執行緒安全的程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用在整個列舉過程：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已等於容量、 清單的容量加倍自動重新配置內部的陣列，並將現有的項目複製到新陣列中，加入新項目之前。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array and copying the existing elements to the new array before the new element is added. 如果小於比容量，這個方法是一種 o （1） 運算。If is less than the capacity, this method is an O(1) operation. 如果需要增加，以容納新項目容量，這個方法會變成 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立的集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 這個方法會判斷是否相等，藉由呼叫。This method determines equality by calling . 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會使用集合的物件和方法`item`來判斷是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷和方法`item`參數集合中的物件。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立的集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 這個方法會判斷是否相等，藉由呼叫。This method determines equality by calling . 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會使用集合的物件和方法`item`來判斷是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷和方法`item`參數集合中的物件。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立的集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已等於容量、 清單的容量加倍插入新項目之前，會自動重新配置內部的陣列。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果`index`等於，`value`加入至結尾。If `index` is equal to , `value` is added to the end of . 在連續項目的集合 (例如清單) 中，後面接著插入點的項目會向下移動以容納新項目。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立的集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. .property instance bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize
ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean Implements IList.IsFixedSize
property bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果 有固定大小，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the has a fixed size; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後新增或移除項目，但允許對現有項目進行修改。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合是唯讀的集合只以防止新增或移除項目; 包裝函式因此，如果變更基礎的集合，包括新增或移除項目，固定大小的集合會反映這些變更。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

.property instance bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly
ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean Implements IList.IsReadOnly
property bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.

value.span: 如果 是唯讀，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the is read-only; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不包含指定的物件，維持不變。If the does not contain the specified object, the remains unchanged. 不會有例外狀況擲回。No exception is thrown. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (`n`) 作業，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 這個方法會判斷是否相等，藉由呼叫。This method determines equality by calling . 在相鄰元素的集合中，例如清單，接在移除的元素之後的元素會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會實作類別，並會使用該實作來建立的集合物件。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects.
